content.rendered:
UNITECH is an Rwandan IT services Company established in 2012, and has been continuously providing excellent work to our clients in both private and public sector. Our IT Company Directors are bred IT tians with a core understanding of IT issues. Our “Can do”, accountable, reliable attitude is what keeps us apart from the rest while our rational, active and knowledgeable team has made us shine in the IT sector.

 

UNITECH offers a perfect blend of technology and people. Our IT association have several IT solutions that has enabled us and our experts to deliver exceptional service to our customers. We promptly believe that technology should be an enabler with the intension to provide accurate insights and data, allowing our team to offer superior quality workdone to customers all over Rwanda.

 

Just take a moment to look around, consider the exceptional IT service offered by the IT company in Kigali. Understand the values of technology deployment and IT support for corporate business in Kigali.  Identify the value of long-term career opportunities by availing our support resource.

 

From technical to professional support, from customer support to sales support grab every bits of opportunities. Over years, we have successfully maintained and implemented dozens of IT company. This has allowed us to scale up and become more productive.

 

We firmly believe in collaboration, so we primarily listen to your needs and Organization background. Being a pro IT provider we believe in right tool and solution to un-complicate day to day work. We monitor, advise, support and secure data.

 

If you run a business in the whole of Kigali, Rwanda our IT company with tech service team is here to benefit your business. Inefficient systems can down turn your leads, so instead of trying to get it done by yourself or wait for any under experience technicians to get it correct, you might be letting go high revenue. So, we get it!

 

A Winning IT Formulae

Security+ Productivity+ Reliability, a successful formula assisting your business to grow. We have proven, we know about the right kind of IT support. The concept “one-size-fits-all” doesn’t at all work for every SMEs or large enterprises.

 

If you are searching for IT company in Rwanda, don’t worry UNITECH is there in rendering excellent, innovative and amazing customer experience. We distinguish ourselves from the rest of IT companies in Kigali, by delivering projects in time and within budget.

 

With our IT Team, you have lots of options for IT support  in Rwanda and we have the capacity in establishing unique relationship with your IT department.

 

Contact us today, to commence with the discussion on IT support services. You will truly get best IT services and we release 100 percent customer satisfactions.

 

UNITECH is a Business IT Company established on excellence, partnership & expertise. What drives us to do more is the power of great customer satisfaction. By sharing a single vision, we want every business acquainted with our IT service to boom and develop.

 

By now we have built a strong reputation as a best tech service provider company. To maintain the hierarchy, we believe in rewarding great performers, offer chances and foster every technical collaboration. Every service provided by us are delivered by passionate professionals allowing companies to manage their business operations.

 

By distributing unrivaled IT support, we ease our clients piled work load. Our only mission is to assist business executives to get the most out of the technology investment.

 

Our squad comprise of certified engineers and technical consultants, who are consistently trained to remain proficient & hold several certifications from industry leaders such as Cisco, HP, Microsoft, VMWare and many more. With extensive knowledge and best practices, our working members are sure to deliver higher breed of IT services.
